channel.title: Brenda on Transcripts of Iriss.fm
channel.description: Recent content in Brenda on Transcripts of Iriss.fm

item.title: Paisley Disability Resource Centre:1
item.description: MM - Michael McEwan KC - Kevin Cantwell BN - Billy Neil B - Brenda BW - Billy White MM Okay, now on Iriss.fm we’re going to do a series about “Inside The Resource Centre”. A lot of people have got a stigma about people with a disability going to the Resource Centre. What can they do? What are they capable of? Well, in this series we’ll prove you wrong. This is part one of two of “Inside The Resource Centre”.
